English: Buy
Sell
Exit
Welcome!
Thank you very much.
How can I help you?
What do you want to buy?
How many do you want to buy?
German: Wie viel davon möchtest du kaufen?

English: What do you want to sell?
How many do you want to sell?
German: Wie viel davon möchtest du verkaufen?

English: I'm waiting for your order.
Come again soon.
Chinese: 誠摯恭候您的再度光臨

English: Is there anything I can help you with?
Chinese: 有什麼能夠為您服務的嗎？

English:
There is a strong digital reaction on the train
platform...
Chinese: 車站的月臺傳來了強烈的數碼反應呢……
Korean: 역 플랫폼에 강한 디지털 반응이 있네요...
German:
Auf dem Bahnsteig gibt es eine starke digitale
Reaktion ...

English:
Welcome!?
It may be an emergency, but I'll still take your
money!
Chinese:
歡、歡迎光臨～！
在這種非常時期下，還是要收錢的！
要收錢的啊－－！！
Korean:
어, 어서오세요~!?
이런 비상시라도 돈은 받습니다!
받고말고요!!
German:
Willkommen?!
Es ist vielleicht ein Notfall, aber ich nehme
trotzdem dein Geld!

English:
Umm... We-we-welcome!?
It is always service with a smile,
no matter what!
Chinese:
歡、歡、歡迎光臨～！
無、無、無論發生什麼事，都要在顧客前保持笑容！
這才叫做專業！
Korean:
어,어,어, 어서오세요오오오~!
어,어, 어떤 때라도 손님 앞에서는 미소로!
그것이 프로입니다!
German:
Ähm ... W-Wi-Willkommen?!
Hier wirst du immer mit einem Lächeln bedient,
egal was passiert!

English: Please don't hesitate to come again.
Chinese: 若有什麼需求，歡迎再度光臨

English: Welcome!
Please select a transaction.
Chinese: 請選擇您要交易的項目

English: What do you want to buy?
Enter the amount you want to buy.
Chinese: 請輸入您要購買的數量

English: What do you want to sell?
Enter the amount you want to sell.
Chinese: 請輸入您要販賣的數量

English: Thank you very much.

Welcome!
This is the DigiMarket.
Chinese:
歡迎光臨。
歡迎來到數碼市場。

English: Please select the Digimon of your choice.
Chinese: 請選一隻喜歡的數碼寶貝。
German: Bitte wähle das gewünschte Digimon aus.

English:
Thank you very much!
Please come again.
Chinese:
謝謝惠顧。
期待您再度利用。

English:
Welcome!
We've added products that are sure to be useful
to a Hudie like yourself.
Chinese:
歡迎光臨。
進了一批對hudie很有用的商品喔。
Korean:
어서오세요.
후디에 멤버에게 도움이 될 만한
상품을 들여놨습니다.
German:
Willkommen! Wir haben Produkte hinzugefügt, die
für ein Hudie-Mitglied wie dich bestimmt nützlich
sind.

English: Please select a transaction.
What're you buying?
Choose how many you want to buy.
German: Wähle, wie viel du kaufen möchtest.

English: What're you selling?
Choose how many you want to sell.
German: Wähle, wie viel du verkaufen möchtest.

English:
Thanks for your patronage!
Come back if you need anything else.
Chinese:
謝謝惠顧
如有需要，請再次利用
German:
Danke für deinen Einkauf! Komm wieder, wenn du
noch etwas brauchst.

English:
I'm the medal master. I can help with your
collection.
Chinese:
嗨，我是獎牌大師
會幫忙你收集獎牌喔
Korean:
여어, 나는 메달 마스터.
너의 메달 수집을 서포트 해주지
German:
Ich bin der Medaillenmeister. Ich kann dir mit
deiner Sammlung helfen.

English: You can be a medal master too!
German: Du kannst auch ein Medaillenmeister sein!

English: You'll have to pay me. I'm not a charity.
Chinese:
我會確實收取金額的喔
這可是確認你對獎牌的愛啊
Korean:
대금은 착실하게 받아갈게.
네 메달 사랑을 확인하고 싶으니까
German:
Du musst mich bezahlen. Ich bin kein
Wohlfahrtsverein.

English: Which medal do you want?
How many do you want to buy?
German: Wie viel davon möchtest du kaufen?

English: Which one do you want to sell?
How many do you want to sell?
German: Wie viel davon möchtest du verkaufen?
